typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as long,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		passenger_count as long,
		trip_time_in_secs as long,
		trip_distance as double,
		pickup_longitude as double,
		pickup_latitude as double,
		dropoff_longitude as double,
		dropoff_latitude as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(vendor_id),
	avgDistance = round(avg(trip_distance),2)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(vendorFullName = case (vendor_id == 'CMT', 'Mobile Knowledge Systems',      vendor_id == 'VTS', 'Verifone Transportation Systems')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	rootfolder as string ('mycontainer'),
	cdmfolder as string ('cdmfolder')
}
source(output(
		TransactionId as string,
		SalesChannelId as string,
		PurchasingChannelId as string,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionAmount as string,
		TotalRetailPriceAmount as string,
		TotalAdjustmentAmount as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		CustomerAccountId as string,
		TransactionTypeId as string,
		MerchantId as string,
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		LoyaltyProgramId as string,
		LoyaltyAccountId as string,
		StoreId as string,
		PaymentCardId as string,
		PointOfSaleId as string,
		TransactionClassificationId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: 'Transaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Transaction.cdm.json',
	entityPath: 'Transaction',
	local: true,
	folderPath: 'CDMfolders',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	rootfolder as string ('mycontainer'),
	cdmfolder as string ('cdmfolder')
}
source(output(
		TransactionId as string,
		SalesChannelId as string,
		PurchasingChannelId as string,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionAmount as string,
		TotalRetailPriceAmount as string,
		TotalAdjustmentAmount as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		CustomerAccountId as string,
		TransactionTypeId as string,
		MerchantId as string,
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		LoyaltyProgramId as string,
		LoyaltyAccountId as string,
		StoreId as string,
		PaymentCardId as string,
		PointOfSaleId as string,
		TransactionClassificationId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: 'Transaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Transaction.cdm.json',
	entityPath: 'Transaction',
	local: true,
	folderPath: ($cdmfolder),
	fileSystem: ($rootfolder)) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> newFile
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> existingTable
newFile derive(fingerprint = sha2(256,columns())) ~> rowSignature
existingTable derive(fingerprint1 = sha2(256,columns())) ~> rowSignature1
rowSignature, rowSignature1 exists(fingerprint == fingerprint1,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,
		int_rate as double,
		installment as double,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as double,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as boolean,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as double,
		delinq_2yrs as double,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as double,
		mths_since_last_delinq as double,
		mths_since_last_record as double,
		open_acc as double,
		pub_rec as double,
		revol_bal as double,
		revol_util as double,
		total_acc as double,
		initial_list_status as boolean,
		out_prncp as double,
		out_prncp_inv as double,
		total_pymnt as double,
		total_pymnt_inv as double,
		total_rec_prncp as double,
		total_rec_int as double,
		total_rec_late_fee as double,
		recoveries as double,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as double,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as double,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as double,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as double,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> loansSource
source(output(
		field as string,
		threshold as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> rules1
rules1 derive(threshold = toFloat(threshold)) ~> Cast
loansSource aggregate(mths_since_last_delinq_nulls = countIf(isNull(mths_since_last_delinq),1),
		next_pymnt_d = countIf(isNull(next_pymnt_d),1),
		rowcount = count(1)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 split(toFloat(mths_since_last_delinq_nulls / rowcount) > sink1#lookup('mths_since_last_delinq').threshold,
	toFloat(next_pymnt_d / rowcount) > sink1#lookup('next_pymnt_d').threshold,
	disjoint: false) ~> ruleNullChecker@(mthssincelastdelinqfail, nextpymntdfail)
Cast sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['field'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
ruleNullChecker@mthssincelastdelinqfail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		{Emp ID} as string,
		{Name Prefix} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Middle Initial} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{E Mail} as string,
		{Father's Name} as string,
		{Mother's Name} as string,
		{Mother's Maiden Name} as string,
		{Date of Birth} as string,
		{Time of Birth} as string,
		{Age in Yrs.} as double '##.##',
		{Weight in Kgs.} as string,
		{Date of Joining} as string,
		{Quarter of Joining} as string,
		{Half of Joining} as string,
		{Year of Joining} as string,
		{Month of Joining} as string,
		{Month Name of Joining} as string,
		{Short Month} as string,
		{Day of Joining} as string,
		{DOW of Joining} as string,
		{Short DOW} as string,
		{Age in Company (Years)} as string,
		Salary as integer,
		{Last % Hike} as string,
		SSN as string,
		{Phone No. } as string,
		{Place Name} as string,
		County as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Zip as string,
		Region as string,
		{User Name} as string,
		Password as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceName
MapNames derive(SoundexValue = soundex(fullname)) ~> FuzzyMatch
Orig1 aggregate(groupBy(SoundexValue),
	soundexmatch = sum(1)) ~> groupSoundex
FuzzyMatch select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Orig1
groupSoundex, soundexBranch join(groupSoundex@SoundexValue == soundexBranch@SoundexValue,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> soundexJoin
FuzzyMatch select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> soundexBranch
soundexJoin aggregate(groupBy(phone,
		soundexBranch@SoundexValue),
	phonematch = sum(1),
		acctnum_agg = last(acctnum)) ~> groupPhone
soundexJoin select(mapColumn(
		soundexmatch,
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue = soundexBranch@SoundexValue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> phoneBranch
groupPhone, phoneBranch join(acctnum_agg == acctnum,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> phoneJoin
phoneJoin aggregate(groupBy(zip,
		phoneBranch@SoundexValue),
	zipcount = sum(1),
		acctnum_agg = last(acctnum_agg)) ~> groupZip
phoneJoin select(mapColumn(
		phonematch,
		soundexmatch,
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone = phoneBranch@phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue = phoneBranch@SoundexValue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> zipBranch
groupZip, zipBranch join(acctnum_agg == acctnum,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> zipJoin
zipJoin derive(soundexweight = 50,
		zipweight = 25,
		phoneweight = 25,
		soundexbool = iif (soundexmatch > 1, 1, 0),
		zipbool = iif (zipcount > 1, 1, 0),
		phonebool = iif (phonematch > 1, 1, 0)) ~> setConstants
setConstants derive(matchscore = (soundexbool * 50) + (zipbool * 25) + (phonebool * 25)) ~> matchScore
matchScore select(mapColumn(
		phone,
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		zip = zipBranch@zip,
		matchscore
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> finalResult
CreateFullName select(mapColumn(
		phone = {Phone No. },
		zip = Zip,
		fullname,
		acctnum = {Emp ID}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> MapNames
sourceName derive(fullname = {First Name} + ' ' + {Last Name}) ~> CreateFullName
finalResult split(matchscore > 50,
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckForDupes@(Duplicates, NotDupe)
CheckForDupes@Duplicates sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dupes.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkDupes
CheckForDupes@NotDupe sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['nodupes.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkNoDupes

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(Rating = iif(year==1988,1,toInteger(Rating)),
		year = iif(year==1960,2021,toInteger(year))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(year==1988),
	insertIf(year==2021),
	deleteIf(year==1950)) ~> AlterRow1
source1 filter(year == 1988 || year == 1960 || year == 1950) ~> Filter1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'moviesdelta',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['movie','year'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	parameter1 as string[] (['a','b','c'])
}
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> movies1
source(output(
		newcolumn as string,
		prevcolumn as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'json',
	container: 'mycontainer',
	fileName: 'nulls.json',
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> columnmappings
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> movies2
movies1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(position==1),
			$parameter1[1] = $$),
		each(match(position==2),
			$parameter1[2] = $$),
		each(match(position==3),
			$parameter1[3] = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ParamReplace
movies2 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!isNull(cachedSink#lookup(name).prevcolumn)),
			cachedSink#lookup($$).newcolumn = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> lookupReplace
columnmappings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	keys:['prevcolumn'],
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> cachedSink

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 50,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 filter(year == 1980) ~> Filter1
source1 derive(currentTime = '_'+regexReplace(toString(currentTimestamp()),'\\s| |\\.|-|:','')) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 derive(releasedate = iif(year == 1980,'_'+toString(:local1)+right('0'+toString(toInteger((random(1)*12)+1)),2)+right('0'+toString(toInteger((random(2)*12)+1)),2),'_20200311'),
		local1 := year) ~> DerivedColumn2
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowFolderUrlColumn:'currentTime',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowFolderUrlColumn:'releasedate',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

sources.name: loans
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> loans

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared loans = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/loan.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = loans,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [term] = " 36 months"),
  #"Lowercased text" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Filtered rows", {{"grade", each Text.Lower(_), type text}}),
  #"Trimmed text" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Lowercased text", {{"verification_status", each Text.Trim(_), type text}})
in
  #"Trimmed text";

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesCSVSource
MoviesCSVSource aggregate(groupBy(year),
	avgRatingForComedies = round(avgIf(instr(lower(genres),'comedy')>0,Rating),2)) ~> AvgComedyRatingByYear
MoviesCSVSource aggregate(groupBy(year),
	minRating = min(Rating),
		maxRating = max(Rating)) ~> minMaxRatingByYear
Filter1 derive(Favorite = true()) ~> Favorite
MoviesCSVSource filter(year == 1980) ~> Filter1
AvgComedyRatingByYear sort(desc(avgRatingForComedies, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1AvgRatingByYear
minMaxRatingByYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2MinMaxRating
Favorite sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato,
		Favorite
	)) ~> sink3Favorites

sources.name: MovieData
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MovieData

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared MovieData = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/moviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = MovieData,
  #"Uppercased text" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {{"genres", each Text.Upper(_), type text}}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Uppercased text", {{"RottenTomato", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Changed column type", {{"RottenTomato", Order.Descending}}),
  #"Lowercased text" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Sorted rows", {{"title", each Text.Lower(_), type text}}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Lowercased text", each [genres] = "COMEDY" or [genres] = "DOCUMENTARY" or [genres] = "DRAMA" or [genres] = "HORROR" or [genres] = "MUSICAL"),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"title", "RottenTomato"}),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Removed columns", {{"Rating", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Pivoted column" = Table.Pivot(Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Changed column type 1", {{"genres", type text}}), {"DRAMA", "HORROR", "COMEDY", "MUSICAL", "DOCUMENTARY"}, "genres", "Rating", List.Average)
in
  #"Pivoted column";
shared #"UserQuery (2)" = let
  Source = MovieData,
  #"Uppercased text" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {{"genres", each Text.Upper(_), type text}}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Uppercased text", {{"RottenTomato", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Changed column type", {{"RottenTomato", Order.Descending}}),
  #"Lowercased text" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Sorted rows", {{"title", each Text.Lower(_), type text}}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Lowercased text", each [genres] = "COMEDY" or [genres] = "DOCUMENTARY" or [genres] = "DRAMA" or [genres] = "HORROR" or [genres] = "MUSICAL"),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"title", "RottenTomato"}),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Removed columns", {{"Rating", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Pivoted column" = Table.Pivot(Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Changed column type 1", {{"genres", type text}}), {"DRAMA", "HORROR", "COMEDY", "MUSICAL", "DOCUMENTARY"}, "genres", "Rating", List.Average)
in
  #"Pivoted column";
shared #"UserQuery (3)" = let
  Source = MovieData,
  #"Uppercased text" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {{"genres", each Text.Upper(_), type text}}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Uppercased text", {{"RottenTomato", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Changed column type", {{"RottenTomato", Order.Descending}}),
  #"Lowercased text" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Sorted rows", {{"title", each Text.Lower(_), type text}}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Lowercased text", each [genres] = "COMEDY" or [genres] = "DOCUMENTARY" or [genres] = "DRAMA" or [genres] = "HORROR" or [genres] = "MUSICAL"),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"title", "RottenTomato"}),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Removed columns", {{"Rating", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Pivoted column" = Table.Pivot(Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Changed column type 1", {{"genres", type text}}), {"DRAMA", "HORROR", "COMEDY", "MUSICAL", "DOCUMENTARY"}, "genres", "Rating", List.Average)
in
  #"Pivoted column";

source(output(
		Date as date,
		Open as double,
		High as double,
		Low as double,
		Close as double,
		Volume as double,
		Dividend as double,
		Split as double,
		Adj_Open as double,
		Adj_High as double,
		Adj_Low as double,
		Adj_Close as double,
		Adj_Volume as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StocksSource
Filter1 window(over(stocksymbol),
	asc(Date, true),
	startRowOffset: -7L,
	endRowOffset: 7L,
	FifteenDayMovingAvg = round(avg(Close),2)) ~> MovingAvgWindow
MovingAvgWindow select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Close,
		FifteenDayMovingAvg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
StocksSource derive(stocksymbol = 'msft') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(High > 0) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Date as date,
		Open as double,
		High as double,
		Low as double,
		Close as double,
		Volume as double,
		Dividend as double,
		Split as double,
		Adj_Open as double,
		Adj_High as double,
		Adj_Low as double,
		Adj_Close as double,
		Adj_Volume as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StocksSource
Filter1 window(over(stocksymbol),
	asc(Date, true),
	startRange: -(days(1)),
	endRange: 0L,
	FifteenDayMovingAvg = lag(High,1,1)) ~> Window1
Window1 select(mapColumn(
		High,
		Close,
		FifteenDayMovingAvg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
StocksSource derive(stocksymbol = 'msft') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(High > 0) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

sources.name: moviesCSV

	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> moviesCSV

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared moviesCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/moviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = moviesCSV
in
  Source;

sources.name: SQLMovies
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLMovies

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared moviesCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/moviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared SQLMovies = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("maksqldb.database.windows.net", "makaw"),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "Movies"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = moviesCSV,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"movie", Int64.Type}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
